definition: to breed (livestock, fish, crops etc)/to grow/to raise
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Various kinds of fish are being bred in the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 水库里放养了许多种鱼。

sentences.english: The researchers said there are close ties between duck grazing patterns and rice cropping intensity.
sentences.chinese: 研究员指出，放养鸭子和水稻栽种密度也有密切关联。

sentences.english: Peoplelike Lynn Jacobs who fights against ranchers using government land tofeed their cattle.
sentences.chinese: 像琳雅各布反对牧场主占用政府的地放养牲畜。

sentences.english: Grass-fed beef, free-range chicken, and cage-free eggs are good choices.
sentences.chinese: 草饲牛肉，自由放养的鸡与鸡蛋都是很好的选择。

sentences.english: Amazingly, when placed in a lake, koi can grow to three feet long.
sentences.chinese: 令人惊讶的是，当放养在湖泊里，锦鲤能长到三尺长。

sentences.english: To prevent is from becoming overgrown, one breeds fish there.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止过度生长，水池中只放养了一个品种的鱼类。

sentences.english: If you do a good job you can raise your stocking rates.
sentences.chinese: 如果做的好，还可以提升放养率。

sentences.english: What to do before stocking clams preparations?
sentences.chinese: 文蛤放养前要做好哪些准备工作？

sentences.english: Managing programmers is like herding cats. -- unknown
sentences.chinese: 管理程序员就像是在放养一群猫。

sentences.english: You herd the herder, as it were.
sentences.chinese: 你放养的牧人，因为它是。

sentences.english: The concept and definition of primitive rearing of Tussah are brought forward in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了柞蚕原生态放养的论题，并给以定义。

sentences.english: Buy a side of naturally raised, hormone-free beef (or pork) and freeze it.
sentences.chinese: 买一块天然放养的无荷尔蒙牛肉或者猪肉并冷冻。

sentences.english: Herding of livestock within the limits of civil airport defined according to law is prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 禁止在依法划定的民用机场范围内放养牲畜。

sentences.english: Raising white wax insects is very profitable in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 放养白蜡虫是农村非常有利的副业。

sentences.english: Where did the old Western round-up go?
sentences.chinese: 从前西部式放养哪里去了？

sentences.english: And have embarked on doing so by increasing the density of livestock.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经在着手增加牧畜放养密度。

definition: to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
to feed (a child, domestic animal etc)/to keep/to raise (an animal)
to release (an animal) into the wild
self-sustaining/economically independent (of state aid, foreign subsidy etc)
